name: nature of becoming
description:
A short visual novel demo for the Go With The Flow: A Period Game Jam.

Sampo is a normal 12-year-old boy who is surprised by the blood in his pants in the school bathroom. What does it all mean, and how do you deal with it? How to deal with your mom, who seems to be more ashamed about periods than you are? Are the ever-present anxiety and dysphoria not enough?

Content warnings: verbal transphobia, gender dysphoria.
